    • Method Detail

      • nextCommittingTransactionId

        public long nextCommittingTransactionId()
        Specified by:
        nextCommittingTransactionId in interface TransactionIdStore
        Returns:
        the next transaction id for a committing transaction. The transaction id is incremented with each call. Ids returned from this method will not be visible from TransactionIdStore.getLastCommittedTransactionId() until handed to TransactionIdStore.transactionCommitted(long, int, long, PageCursorTracer).

      • committingTransactionId

        public long committingTransactionId()
        Specified by:
        committingTransactionId in interface TransactionIdStore
        Returns:
        the transaction id of last committing transaction.

      • transactionCommitted

        public void transactionCommitted​(long transactionId,
                                 int checksum,
                                 long commitTimestamp,
                                 PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionIdStore
        Signals that a transaction with the given transaction id has been committed (i.e. appended to a log). Calls to this method may come in out-of-transaction-id order. The highest transaction id seen given to this method will be visible in TransactionIdStore.getLastCommittedTransactionId().
        Specified by:
        transactionCommitted in interface TransactionIdStore
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the applied transaction id.
        checksum - checksum of the transaction.
        commitTimestamp - the timestamp of the transaction commit.
        cursorTracer - underlying page cursor tracer

      • getLastCommittedTransactionId

        public long getLastCommittedTransactionId()
        Specified by:
        getLastCommittedTransactionId in interface TransactionIdStore
        Returns:
        highest seen TransactionIdStore.transactionCommitted(long, int, long, PageCursorTracer) committed transaction id}.

      • getLastCommittedTransaction

        public TransactionId getLastCommittedTransaction()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionIdStore
        Returns transaction information about the highest committed transaction, i.e. transaction id as well as checksum.
        Specified by:
        getLastCommittedTransaction in interface TransactionIdStore
        Returns:
        TransactionId describing the last (i.e. highest) committed transaction.

      • getUpgradeTransaction

        public TransactionId getUpgradeTransaction()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionIdStore
        Returns transaction information about transaction where the last upgrade was performed, i.e. transaction id as well as checksum.
        Specified by:
        getUpgradeTransaction in interface TransactionIdStore
        Returns:
        TransactionId describing the most recent upgrade transaction.

      • getLastClosedTransactionId

        public long getLastClosedTransactionId()
        Specified by:
        getLastClosedTransactionId in interface TransactionIdStore
        Returns:
        highest seen gap-free TransactionIdStore.transactionClosed(long, long, long, PageCursorTracer) closed transaction id}.

      • getLastClosedTransaction

        public long[] getLastClosedTransaction()
        Description copied from interface: TransactionIdStore
        Returns transaction information about the last committed transaction, i.e. transaction id as well as the log position following the commit entry in the transaction log.
        Specified by:
        getLastClosedTransaction in interface TransactionIdStore
        Returns:
        transaction information about the last closed (highest gap-free) transaction. 
         [0]: transaction id
 [1]: log version
 [2]: byte offset into that log version

      • setLastCommittedAndClosedTransactionId

        public void setLastCommittedAndClosedTransactionId​(long transactionId,
                                                   int checksum,
                                                   long commitTimestamp,
                                                   long logByteOffset,
                                                   long logVersion,
                                                   PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionIdStore
        Used by recovery, where last committed/closed transaction ids are set. Perhaps this shouldn't be exposed like this?
        Specified by:
        setLastCommittedAndClosedTransactionId in interface TransactionIdStore
        Parameters:
        transactionId - transaction id that will be the last closed/committed id.
        checksum - checksum of the transaction.
        commitTimestamp - the timestamp of the transaction commit.
        logByteOffset - offset in the log file where the committed entry has been written.
        logVersion - version of log the committed entry has been written into.
        cursorTracer - underlying page cursor tracer.

      • transactionClosed

        public void transactionClosed​(long transactionId,
                              long logVersion,
                              long logByteOffset,
                              PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionIdStore
        Signals that a transaction with the given transaction id has been fully applied. Calls to this method may come in out-of-transaction-id order.
        Specified by:
        transactionClosed in interface TransactionIdStore
        Parameters:
        transactionId - the applied transaction id.
        logVersion - version of log the committed entry has been written into.
        logByteOffset - offset in the log file where start writing the next log entry.
        cursorTracer - underlying page cursor tracer

      • resetLastClosedTransaction

        public void resetLastClosedTransaction​(long transactionId,
                                       long logVersion,
                                       long byteOffset,
                                       boolean missingLogs,
                                       PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionIdStore
        Unconditionally set last closed transaction info. Should be used for cases where last closed transaction info should be set or overwritten.
        Specified by:
        resetLastClosedTransaction in interface TransactionIdStore
        Parameters:
        transactionId - new last closed transaction id.
        logVersion - new last closed transaction log version
        byteOffset - new last closed transaction offset
        missingLogs - flag to record missing logs date
        cursorTracer - underlying page cursor tracer

        public void flush​(PageCursorTracer cursorTracer)
        Description copied from interface: TransactionIdStore
        Forces the transaction id counters to persistent storage.
        Specified by:
